sentence.Network_en: We should run all undertakings industrially and thriftily.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要勤俭办一切事业.

sentence.Network_en: Glory in living thriftily and struggling ; take sybaritism to be a disgrace.
sentence.Network_cn: 以艰苦奋斗为荣、以骄奢淫逸为耻.

sentences.sentence: "a used towel that he had used and had left thriftily on the ledge below the mirror rather than consign to the linen basket"
